name: Park Lands Investor
description:
Summary

Park Lands is a lawless country that begin to develop new industries in the year 8077, where assassination is a thriving business and body parts have become tradable commodity. You’ve left your old life behind with new goal of being the best investor in the country. Are you going to die or survive till the end?

Overview

Park Lands Investor, is an investing simulation game whereby you invest in companies in a new industries such as assassination, disposal services, transportation and more. In a lawless country, anything can happen and as such you can also invest in commodities.

Observe and make decisions on which company to invest in or perhaps stick to commodities for a much safer bet. Will you be able to score big or lose?

Opponents & People

There will be investment firms investing in the companies that are already public and as such they have deep pockets, so reaching their level will be on hard journey. People on the other hand are trying to get by in a lawless country.
